column2: "/mn15 /ci2 1 You OK?! We're here to help! You look like you've got your hands full with these guys. Time for us to show them what we're made of!"
"/mn15 /ci2 1 Man, that was a tough one. Still, we got through it, thanks to you. We'll rescue the crew!"
"/mn2 I told you you were overdoing it. You rest a while."
